thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 23 of 533
thread.title: Lori

author: Lori
title: Lori
text: I would have liked to buy quite a few pair of high waisted leggings but, there was only 1 design in my size...really not cool. Especially since you're having a sale for presidents day, there is very little to buy. I found that to be the same in the salar capri leggings also. I would also like to shop for pants based on compression and I have to check each style to find that there are only a couple offered in high compression. How about some full length built in bra tanks as well. Not everyone wants to bare their midriff...
